$5,000? I thought it was two?
Those are 2017 rates, Mr. Jablonski.
Then there is 15% off the top of every fang,
translation.fr: On enlève 15 % de la somme de chaque croc,

translation.en: and we have to hold 50% until we receive your paperwork.
translation.fr: on retient 50 % avant que tout soit signé.

translation.en: And, of course, $10 for your membership card,
translation.fr: Et bien sûr, 10 $ pour la carte de membre,

translation.en: which gets you one free app at Cheesecake Factory.
translation.fr: qui donne des réducs sur les cheesecakes.

translation.en: -I don't like cheesecake. -Do you have that?
translation.fr: - J'aime pas ça. - Vous les avez ?

translation.en: Why won't you take the $10 out of that? Taking everything else.
You don't have cash on you? You really wanna make me split this?
translation.fr: Pas de liquide ? Je dois casser ça ?

translation.en: Okay, you are good to go.
translation.fr: C'est bon, vous pouvez y aller.

translation.en: Am I?
If you have any issues with this,
Carol right here would be happy to further assist you.
translation.fr: Carol se fera un plaisir de vous aider.

translation.en: Oh, great. I see you met your Union rep.
translation.fr: Super. Tu as rencontré ton délégué syndical.

translation.en: What?
[John] Come on, Bud.
Sir, please.
That new girl's a smoke show.
Right, but I'm begging you to reconsider. I'm not meant for the field.
translation.fr: Pitié, pas moi, je ne suis pas fait pour le terrain.

translation.en: I just bought an ergonomic chair with my own money. I'm all in on the desk.
translation.fr: Je me suis offert un fauteuil ergonomique, j'adore mon poste.

translation.en: That's why I need you out there with him. Right? Someone who knows the codes to the letter.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que j'ai besoin de toi, tu connais tous les codes.

translation.en: -Okay, but-- -Hey, hey, hey.
Do you wanna move up here?
You gotta get your ass out in the field. All right?
translation.fr: Alors, va me faire du terrain.

translation.en: Think about it this way, you're gonna be my eyes and ears, my friend.
translation.fr: Tu seras mes yeux et mes oreilles, mon ami.

translation.en: -Right? -Right--
And the minute he messes up, the minute he goes against code,
translation.fr: Dès qu'il fera une connerie, qu'il violera un code,

translation.en: you'll be there reporting it back to me, right?
The sooner he fucks up, the sooner your sweet cheeks are in Carol's desk.
translation.fr: Plus vite il se plantera, plus vite tu auras le poste de Carol.

translation.en: You work out?
-A little. -Yeah, thought so.
translation.fr: - Un peu. - Je me disais aussi.

translation.en: You're late.
Close it.
I was actually here an hour ago, but you weren't, so I went to go get us breakfast.
translation.fr: Vous n'étiez pas là il y a une heure, je suis allé prendre un petit-déj.

translation.en: I got you an organic, gluten-free, paleo bran muffin.
translation.fr: Je vous ai pris un muffin au son sans gluten.

translation.en: Really? Thank you.
-I was starving. -That was a six-dollar muffin.
translation.fr: - J'ai la dalle. - Un muffin à 6 $.

translation.en: -What do you have on? -What?
-What are you wearing? -Just, like, normal clothes.
The handbook says blend in on the hunt. Be inconspicuous.
translation.fr: On doit se fondre dans la masse, passer inaperçu.

translation.en: You have on a suit. How's that inconspicuous?
translation.fr: T'es en costard, en quoi tu passes…

translation.en: You have on a suit. We're in the Valley. In the summertime.
translation.fr: Dans la vallée ? En plein été ?

translation.en: -It's a summery suit. -A summery suit?
-Juniper green. Yes. -What is juniper green?
A hue of green I found to be complementary against my skin tone.
translation.fr: Une nuance de vert qui va bien avec mon teint.

translation.en: Whatever it is, don't wear it again.
Look, I'll put myself together, and we'll take off, all right?
translation.fr: Je vais me préparer et on décolle, OK ?

translation.en: -Do you have somewhere I can hang this? -Yep.
Not there.
I'll just… hold on to it.
This ain't gonna last.
Got enough weapons and ammo in here to take down El Jefe, huh?
translation.fr: Vous avez assez d'artillerie pour éliminer El Jefe.

translation.en: [chuckles] What you know about El Jefe?
Oh, come on. Legendary 700-year-old European vampire.
translation.fr: Un vampire européen légendaire, vieux de 700 ans.

translation.en: Some say he's at the top of the LA drug trade, just waiting for his moment to reemerge.
translation.fr: On dit qu'il gère le trafic de drogue, qu'il attend son heure.

translation.en: Fangs so sharp, with just one, you could buy a mansion in Bel Air.
translation.fr: Un de ses crocs paierait pour une villa à Bel Air.

translation.en: You sound like Big John.
Whole lot of gibberish. You know that's a crock of shit, right?
translation.fr: Tu gobes tout. Tu sais que c'est des conneries, hein ?

translation.en: I didn't take you for an arts and crafts guy.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas l'air d'un manuel, c'est quoi, ça ?

translation.en: -What are these all about? -Wanna keep your hands off my shit?
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas l'air d'un manuel, c'est quoi, ça ? Touche pas, tu veux ?

translation.en: It's my trophy case.
For each one that I kill, I, uh… They're already dead, but you get my drift.
translation.fr: Quand j'en tue un… Ils sont déjà morts, mais tu vois l'idée.

translation.en: 'Cause they're allergic to wood. Smart.
They're allergic to wood, but not just any wood. It's mpingo wood.
translation.fr: Pas à n'importe quel bois. La grenadille.

translation.en: The strongest African hardwood. Not that Ikea shit.
translation.fr: Du bois africain, robuste. Pas comme IKEA.

translation.en: We mix it with the garlic. The wooden bullets pierce the heart.
translation.fr: Mélangé à l'ail. Les balles en bois percent le cœur.

translation.en: -The silver-- -Silver to the throat. Right.
Yeah. Cuts the head off… usually.
translation.fr: Pour trancher la tête. En temps normal.

translation.en: Usually. Right, you are referring to Uber Vamps,
who have come back from decapitation.
[Bud] Not if you blast the heart with wood before you cut their throats with silver.
translation.fr: Pas si on leur perce le cœur avant de leur couper la gorge.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. You also forgot to mention that you can kill them by burning them.
translation.fr: Vous oubliez qu'on peut les tuer en les brûlant.

translation.en: I didn't forget anything. That's how I get my money.
Why would I burn the fangs? I don't do that.
Listen, Guacamole Suit,
right there on the shelf, grab that for me.
translation.fr: va chercher la caisse sur l'étagère.

translation.en: Get that, we'll take off.
And remember, whatever you do, don't…
drop my shit.
translation.fr: ne… laisse pas tomber mes trucs.

translation.en: So, uh, where we going?
I'm going hunting. I don't know about you.
translation.fr: Moi, chasser. Toi, je sais pas.

translation.en: Why you wearing the seat belt like that?
I mean, usually the seat belts aren't like this complicated and heavy. But--
translation.fr: D'habitude, elles sont moins compliquées, moins lourdes.

translation.en: It's not complicated. It's just a seat belt. It protects you.
translation.fr: Compliquée ? C'est une ceinture, ça te protège.

translation.en: Sure.
Sure. It's still protecting me though. If anything happened, it's just--
translation.fr: Là aussi, ça me protège, s'il arrive un truc, je…

translation.en: See? It still catches me.
I see.
It's gonna be a long day.
So, are you gonna tell me what we're doing at an animal shelter?
translation.fr: Vous pouvez me dire ce qu'on fait à un chenil ?

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you shit.
What you know about Juvies?
Juvies or Juveniles, AKA Zombie Vamps,
translation.fr: Juvé ou Juvéniles, alias vampires zombies.

translation.en: formed when an already young vamp turns somebody else.
translation.fr: Quand un jeune vampire transforme quelqu'un.

translation.en: Instead of the strength of a full vamp,
they lack regenerative abilities and appear more dead than alive.
translation.fr: il se régénère mal et a l'air plus mort que vif.

translation.en: They can't process human blood yet, so what do they do?
translation.fr: Faute de digérer le sang humain, il fait quoi ?

translation.en: -I'm aware. -They feed off of small animals, rodents.
translation.fr: Il se nourrit d'animaux, de rongeurs.

translation.en: So you've read the book?
I don't have to read it. I'm out here.
What do you know about different species of vampires?
translation.fr: Et les différentes espèces de vampires ?

translation.en: I know there are five types. Southern, Eastern, Spider, Uber, and Juvenile.
translation.fr: Cinq types : Méridional, Oriental, Arthropode, Uber et Juvénile.

translation.en: They are largely solitary, but when together, there is a hierarchy.
translation.fr: Surtout solitaires, mais soumis à une hiérarchie.

translation.en: They organize by age. What else?
The sunlight is the only thing they're scared of.
translation.fr: Une peur : la lumière du soleil.

translation.en: They can't reproduce, but they can turn people. Should I continue?
translation.fr: Ne peuvent pas se reproduire, mais transformer les gens, si.

translation.en: -What about familiars? -You think this guy's one of them?
translation.fr: - Et les familiers ? - C'en est un ?

translation.en: I don't know. You tell me.
translation.fr: À toi de me le dire.

translation.en: -Hmm? -I think he fits the profile.
-You think so? -Absolutely.
More powerful vamps have more powerful familiars.
translation.fr: Il y en a de différentes puissances.

translation.en: And when it comes to Juvies, a little kid like this,
translation.fr: Côté Juvé, un jeune comme ça,

translation.en: he's probably grabbing those cats for 'em, try to get 'em turned.
translation.fr: il doit choper des chats, essayer de les transformer.

translation.en: -Oh man. -What?
No, I'm just a big cat lover. I got two of them myself.
translation.fr: J'adore les chats. J'en ai deux.

translation.en: Well, that explains it.
-Want to see a picture? -No, I don't.
Maybe later.
All right. Here we go.
[Bud] There's his car.
Canoga Bowl. Closed for 18 months.
It's perfect.
-Can I offer some advice? -No.
I mean, economically speaking, why go after Juvies?
Why not let them ripen, come back when their teeth are valuable?
translation.fr: Ses dents valent rien, pour l'instant.

translation.en: I could come back in September, but right now, I'm out of time.
translation.fr: Pas le temps de revenir en septembre, je suis pressé.

translation.en: And beggars can't be choosers.
Plus, you don't want these things biting people, do you?
translation.fr: Et puis, il pourrait mordre des gens.

translation.en: Wait. Why don't you have time?
-Why you ask me so many questions? -I'm just--
Just stay in the truck and do your business.
Stay in the truck? No, I have to be with you at all times in the field.
translation.fr: Ici ? Non, je dois être avec vous en permanence.

translation.en: -Union rules. -Other than keeping you alive,
translation.fr: C'est la règle. Je m'en tape, de la règle.

translation.en: I don't give a shit about rules.
translation.fr: Je m'en tape, de la règle.

translation.en: No, no, you don't understand. All times.
You're gonna stay in this car. With that in mind, here.
-What? No, I don't believe in guns. -You don't believe in 'em?
translation.fr: - Non, je ne crois pas aux armes. - Pardon ?

translation.en: No, they're amoral. They're killing machines. They're not for me.
translation.fr: C'est immoral. Des machines à tuer. Pas pour moi.

translation.en: When I was a kid, I tried shooting a squirrel with a BB gun,
and I just couldn't. All right?
I still have nightmares where I can see his little face
making little squirrel noises, and I still have nightmares about it.
translation.fr: je l'entends faire des petits bruits d'écureuil.

translation.en: Made squirrel noises, huh?
-What does a squirrel noise sound like? -It's like…
translation.fr: - Ça ressemble à quoi ? - Ça fait…

translation.en: Whatever! I don't wanna talk about it.
translation.fr: Bref ! J'ai pas envie d'en parler.

translation.en: Stay in the truck.
It's impossible.
How the hell can you be here? It's daytime.
translation.fr: Comment tu peux sortir ? Il fait jour !

translation.en: You've been a bad boy, Troy.
Did you know that a vampire cannot live without its fangs?
translation.fr: Tu sais qu'un vampire ne peut pas vivre sans ses crocs ?

translation.en: And yet, for whatever reason, whatever cruel joke from the gods…
translation.fr: Pourtant, par cruauté divine ou pour une raison quelconque,

translation.en: they are the one thing we cannot regenerate.
translation.fr: c'est le seul truc qu'on peut pas régénérer.

translation.en: Everything that makes a vampire a predator
translation.fr: Tout ce qui fait d'un vampire un prédateur

translation.en: is in its fangs.
Each set is a life that could have lived a thousand lives.
translation.fr: Chaque paire est une vie qui aurait pu vivre mille vies.

translation.en: Lives that you had a part in ending.
translation.fr: Des vies volées par ta faute.

translation.en: Yet it wasn't always like this, you know?
translation.fr: Ça n'a pas toujours été comme ça.

translation.en: There was a time when you humans, you worshiped us as gods.
translation.fr: Il fut un temps, vous, les humains, nous vénériez comme des dieux.

translation.en: Right here in this valley, you built temples of blood and bone to honor us.
translation.fr: Ici même dans cette vallée, avec des temples de sang et d'os.

translation.en: And then you turned on us.
translation.fr: Avant de vous retourner contre nous.

translation.en: Well, guess what?
I'm gonna take back what's ours,
translation.fr: Je vais reprendre ce qui est à nous,

translation.en: one property at a time.
The way I see it, you have two choices, two doors.
translation.fr: Selon moi, deux choix s'offrent à toi, deux portes.

translation.en: One, you bend the knee and join me in service, and you live.
translation.fr: Un, tu te rends, tu deviens mon esclave et tu as la vie sauve.

translation.en: And two…
you don't.
All right. So, what the hell do you want? Huh?
Who brought you this tooth?
A name.
You're so full of shit, lady.
You think you're a god?
translation.fr: Tu te prends pour une déesse,

translation.en: You're not gods. You're a big mistake.
translation.fr: mais que dalle, vous êtes une erreur.

translation.en: You're a genetic mutation that would've died out
translation.fr: Une mutation génétique qui aurait dû s'éteindre

translation.en: if there hadn't been a stinking hole for y'all to crawl into.
translation.fr: sans le trou puant dans lequel vous avez tous rampé.

translation.en: Door number two it is.
No. No! [echoing] No!
Time for the tooth fairy.
Hello, sir.
How are we on this fine morning?
translation.fr: Comment ça va de bon matin ?

translation.en: Any violations to report?
He is certainly heading that way,
but nothing verified quite yet.
translation.fr: mais rien de vérifié pour l'instant.

translation.en: Well, where is he now?
He left me in the car and went into a bowling alley.
translation.fr: Il m'a laissé dans la voiture pour aller au bowling.

translation.en: You didn't follow him?
I thought he was gonna shoot me! He's very difficult to reason with, sir.
translation.fr: J'ai cru qu'il allait me tirer dessus, il n'est pas commode.

translation.en: Kid! You want your promotion?
You want Carol's desk?
Then get off your ass, get in there, and verify those violations.
translation.fr: Alors, bouge ton cul, va vérifier ces manquements !

translation.en: Ugh! Hair on your nipples!
-[Seth] Bud? -Seth!
-Seth! -Shit.
-Bud! -[Bud] Hurry up! Shoot it!
I… I don't have my gun!
-Give me my shotgun! -[snarling]
I'm… I'm just an observer!
Your gonna be hors d'œuvre if you don't give me that gun!
translation.fr: Vite, ou on va se faire bouffer !

translation.en: Shit! Shit! Shit!
Whoa! I'm sorry!
Next time I tell you, "Gimme that goddamn gun," you gimme that goddamn gun!
translation.fr: La prochaine fois, tu me passes mon flingue !

translation.en: -Now duck! -What?
I said duck!
You okay?
Oh, jeez. That was horrible.
These Juvie teeth ain't worth shit, but get enough of 'em…
translation.fr: Ça vaut pas cher, mais si on en a plein,

translation.en: It's a number game like you said. Uh, you okay?
What's going on?
Oh, come on. No, no, I'm not okay.
-All right? Look at me! -What?
Vampires just tried to kill me.
translation.fr: Des vampires ont tenté de me tuer.

translation.en: You put a gun in my face, and now I just pissed my favorite fucking suit!
translation.fr: Vous m'avez menacé d'une arme, j'ai souillé mon costume préféré !

translation.en: Hey, hey. Relax. You did good in there. You did good in there.
Besides, everybody pisses themselves the first time.
translation.fr: Tout le monde se pisse dessus la 1re fois.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-Did you? -No, I… No, I didn't. But listen, you did.
translation.fr: - Vous aussi ? - Non. Mais toi, oui.

translation.en: Here, dry your eyes. Dry your eyes, okay.
translation.fr: Allez, pleure pas, sèche tes larmes.

translation.en: You know what?
Put it on me. My bad. We bit off more than we could chew today.
translation.fr: C'est pas ta faute. On a été un peu trop ambitieux.

translation.en: So why don't we go home, get some rest.
In the morning, we'll kick some motherfucking ass. Okay?
translation.fr: Demain matin, on ira démonter ces crevures.

translation.en: -Okay. -All right, come on.
Let's get in the car.
What the fuck is that? What'd you eat today?
You know what?
Let's have you get in the back. Don't want you to get that on my vintage seats.
translation.fr: Monte à l'arrière, pour pas salir mes sièges vintage.

translation.en: -What, are you serious? -Damn right.
Come on. Gotta move.
Hang your leg out the back so we can air dry.
translation.fr: Passe une jambe dehors, que ça sèche.

translation.en: -You forgot your man-purse. -Wait. That's expens--
translation.fr: - Ton sac à main. - C'est une…

translation.en: You gotta get some of this too.
I'm sure you know, Mr. Union Man. But when vamps are killed,
translation.fr: Tu dois le savoir, quand un vampire meurt,

translation.en: they release a gas that gets on you that other vamps can sniff out.
translation.fr: il dégage un gaz qui nous imprègne et nous donne une odeur.

translation.en: So you gotta get all of that off. Here, take this.
translation.fr: Les vampires la sentent, faut s'en débarrasser.

translation.en: It's my special blend, like a little, uh, skunk musk, okay?
translation.fr: Un produit de ma fabrication, du musc de putois, disons.

translation.en: -Now, get that on you, in the shower. -Oh Jesus.
translation.fr: Mets-en partout. - La vache. - Sous la douche, partout.

translation.en: On every inch of you, okay?
translation.fr: - La vache. - Sous la douche, partout.

translation.en: Be extremely careful. Don't get it in your eyes.
translation.fr: Mais fais gaffe, pas dans les yeux,

translation.en: And whatever you do,
don't get it in your butthole. What happens in the butthole?
I mean, it can't kill you, but… Jesus Christ.
translation.fr: Ça te tuera pas, mais… putain.

translation.en: By the way, lock your doors, don't come out after dark, and, uh…
translation.fr: Au fait, barricade-toi, ne sors pas la nuit et…

translation.en: -Guess what? -What?
You're dried up.
Oh!
translation.fr: SUPER. N'OUBLIE PAS LA FÊTE DE PAIGE VENDREDI.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Oh God. It's okay. -I'm sorry about that.
-No, no, me. I got it. -It's okay.
It's my fault. I couldn't see over my baskets.
I got it. This is a… You a… you a doctor?
translation.fr: Je vous aide. C'est… Vous êtes médecin ?

translation.en: Uh, nurse, actually.
Hope you don't think this is weird, but you got a lot of scrubs.
translation.fr: Ne le prenez pas mal, mais vous avez plein de blouses.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I hate doing laundry, so I kind of just kept buying new ones.
translation.fr: Je déteste les lessives. Alors, j'en achète des neuves.

translation.en: -Got out of control. -Okay.
But, hey, new apartment. Why not start off on the right foot?
Yeah. Well, welcome to the building. I'm right there in 20.
translation.fr: Bienvenue. Je suis juste là, au 20.

translation.en: -Oh! Well, I'm Heather. I'm in 19. -Well, I'm Bud 20. [chuckles]
translation.fr: - Heather. Je suis au 19. - Bud, au 20.

translation.en: Can you help me with that, actually?
[Bud] Oh. Yeah.
-[Heather] Thanks. -Yeah, no problem.
-You can just put that down anywhere. -Sure. Okay.
translation.fr: - Posez ça où vous voulez. - D'accord.

translation.en: -See you've got a retro vibe poppin', huh? -Mm-hmm.
-Dig that. -Thanks.
I wish I had a beer or something to offer you.
translation.fr: J'aimerais avoir une bière à vous offrir.

translation.en: Uh, a previous tenant left some ice cream in the freezer, if you're interested.
translation.fr: L'ancien locataire a laissé de la glace au congélo, si ça vous dit.

translation.en: No, thanks. I'll take a rain check.
-You sure? -Yeah. Welcome to the building.
Thank you.
Feeling better?
Not really.
Got a little bit of that yellow stuff in my butthole.
translation.fr: Le truc jaune est un peu rentré dans mon anus.

translation.en: It was so much worse than what you even described.
translation.fr: Bien pire que ce que vous m'avez décrit.

translation.en: Bet it was.
You looking for something?
-Whoa. Hey, that's personal. -No, no, no.
"Violation code 101, terminated vamps and didn't report to the Union."
translation.fr: "Violation du code 101, vampires éliminés sans le signaler."

translation.en: "Violation code 276, breaking and entering without Union sanctions."
translation.fr: "Violation du code 276, entré par effraction sans accord préalable."

translation.en: -That did happen. -Violation. Violation. Violation.
Oh, look at this. "Needs to reimburse me for six-dollar muffin"?
translation.fr: Et là : "Doit me rembourser le muffin à six dollars" ?

translation.en: It's a standard part of Union procedure.
-I have to document everything. -It's not.
It's for Seeger to keep me out the Union. Ain't that great?
translation.fr: C'est pour Seeger, pour me dégager. Merci !

translation.en: You almost got me killed yesterday.
You almost got yourself killed yesterday.
I told you stay your punk-ass in the car. That's why I work by myself.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit de rester ici. Je bosse tout seul.

translation.en: Listen. What? You're gonna die in the name of kissing your boss's ass?
translation.fr: Tu veux crever pour faire plaisir à ton chef ?

translation.en: Well, he didn't give me a choice, okay?
translation.fr: Il ne m'a pas laissé le choix.

translation.en: Listen to me, Mr. Union Fellow.
I may not follow all the Union rules, but let me tell you something.
translation.fr: Je suis pas les règles, mais je vais te dire un truc.

translation.en: If we went by the book, we'd both be dead by now!
translation.fr: Si on les avait suivies, on serait morts.

translation.en: And you saw that yesterday.
Look. Just give me a couple of days.
Okay, a couple days.
So, what's on the agenda today?
Like every day.
Hunting vampires.
[Seth] Bud, what are we doing at a pawn shop?
translation.fr: On fait quoi chez un prêteur sur gages ?

translation.en: [Bud] This dude's cheap as shit, but he got goods we need in order to, uh…
translation.fr: Il est méga radin, mais il a des trucs utiles pour…

translation.en: What the hell?
Oh Jesus.
[whispers] Shut up. Shut up.
Don't you puke in here! Don't touch nothing. Don't leave your DNA.
translation.fr: Ne vomis pas ! Ne touche à rien. Ne laisse pas d'ADN.

translation.en: I swallowed it.
Damn it.
Wait, is that…
It was.
[Seth] Oh no.
Who… who does that?
All right, we gotta move.
Wait a minute. Take this.
Are you kidding me?
-It's not right, okay. Wait-- -Damn right. How you think he feels, huh?
translation.fr: - C'est pas correct. - Et pour lui, alors ?

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
Wait. You can't leave. That's against protocol.
We have to call the Union and wait for them.
translation.fr: On doit le signaler et attendre.

translation.en: -Code 233 says any hunter who encounters… -Code? I don't give a shit.
translation.fr: - Le code 233 veut que si on tombe… - Rien à battre.

translation.en: …suspicious civilian death will be under a 30-day suspension--
translation.fr: … sur des morts suspectes, c'est 30 jours…

translation.en: We don't have 30 days. I don't give fuck!
We gotta leave. There's other vamps around here. Let's go.
translation.fr: Les vampires rôdent. On se barre !

translation.en: No, no. I'm calling.
Whoa! We have dead humans here. We have to report this.
translation.fr: Des humains morts, il faut le signaler.

translation.en: That ain't no dead human! That's my friend!
Listen, I'm not telling you you cannot report it.
translation.fr: Je dis pas qu'on doit pas le signaler.

translation.en: I'm just telling you to delay it.
We'll make an anonymous call to the cops, and, after 24 hours,
